title: Cup And Saucer, "World Festival of Youth and Students", 1985
markings: underside of both cup and saucer: Lomonosov "LFZ" mark stamped in orange over-glaze.
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Cup cylindrical, flaring towards top, narrowed at base, loop handle; painted in orange/brown with figures of young athletes blowing trumpets, emblem, "1985" at base. Saucer circular; four sprays of leaves at border and inscription in square around center (in Russian): "World Festival of Youth and Students" painted in orange/brown, gilded band at rim.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cup And Saucer, "World Festival of Youth and Students", 1985.
1985. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-116-a,b.
